greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of n-node connected labeled graphs without endpoints.
reference: Miklos Bona, editor, Handbook of Enumerative Combinatorics, CRC Press, 2015, p. 404.
link: Vaclav Kotesovec, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..80
formula: a(n) = Sum_{i=0..n} (-1)^i*binomial(n, i)*c(n-i)*(n-i)^i, for n>2, a(0)=1, a(1)=1, a(2)=0, where c(n) is number of n-node connected labeled graphs (cf. A001187).
Logarithmic transform of A100743, if we assume a(1) = 0. - _Gus Wiseman_, Aug 15 2019
maple: a:= n-> max(0, add((-1)^i*binomial(n, i)*c(n-i)*(n-i)^i, i=0..n)):
mathematica: c[0] = 1; c[n_] := c[n] = 2^(n*(n-1)/2) - Sum[k*Binomial[n, k]*2^((n-k)*(n - k - 1)/2)*c[k], {k, 1, n-1}]/n; a[0] = a[1] = 1; a[2] = 0; a[n_] := Sum[(-1)^i*Binomial[n, i]*c[n-i]*(n-i)^i, {i, 0, n}]; Table[a[n], {n, 0, 15}] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Oct 27 2017, using _Alois P. Heinz_'s code for c(n) *)
program: (PARI) seq(n)={Vec(serlaplace(1 + x^2/2 + log(sum(k=0, n, 2^binomial(k, 2)*(x*exp(-x + O(x^n)))^k/k!))))} \\ _Andrew Howroyd_, Sep 09 2018
xref: Cf. A059167 (n-node labeled graphs without endpoints), A004108 (n-node connected unlabeled graphs without endpoints), A004110 (n-node unlabeled graphs without endpoints).
results.author: _Vladeta Jovovic_, Jan 12 2001
ext: More terms from John Renze (jrenze(AT)yahoo.com), Feb 01 2001
